title: Crate Rewards Tool
description:
I wanted to do something a little bit different and expand what this site offers beyond just the price guide. So I thought, how about some of the tools I've been building for myself?

The Crate Rewards Tool is the first of these - it's what I use to build and manage my own CrazyCrates configurations. Build custom crate rewards with items, weights, and enchantments, then export them directly to YAML format for your server.

I also took the opportunity to clean up a few other things while I was at it - added some icons to the main navigation, changed 'Home' to 'Price Guide' for clarity, and cleaned up the styling on this page.

Crate Rewards Tool features:
changes: New Crate Rewards Tool for CrazyCrates plugin configuration
Build crate prizes one item at a time with custom quantities and weights
See the value of each prize to help balance your crate rewards
Import existing crate configurations from YAML files
Export your crates in CrazyCrates Prizes YAML format for easy server integration
Set custom values and enchantments for each reward
Simulate rewards to test your crate configurations
Support for all Minecraft versions (1.16 through 1.20)
Note: The tool might be a bit wonky on mobile - I'm still working on that part!
